knimeNode.name: FilterLowExpressed
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node can be used to filter low expressed genes before differential expression analysis.

fullDescription.intro: This node can be used to filter low expressed genes before differential expression analysis. It takes as input a count table and a annotation file.
fullDescription.option: minimum number of reads per sample (default: 10)
fraction of samples which must have the minimum read number (default: 0.5)
if checked, condition must be fulfilled for both conditions separately (default: true)

ports.inPort:
Cell 0: ID of feature
Cell 1...n: count of feature in sample
Must contain a header line with the names of the samples

RowNames: Name of the sample like it is named in the count table
Cell 0: condition (should only contain two conditions and column should be named condition)
ports.outPort: Same format as input count table but some genes were filtered out based on the settings.
